title: 1. Discover Phase
description: Let's chat! We'll hop on a call, get to know one another, and discuss how I can help you and your business.

title: 2. Design Phase
description: I create website mock-ups, working with you along the way to ensure the product matches your vision and will accomplish your goals.

title: 3. Build Phase
description: I build your website from the ground up using the latest technologies. The final product will be fast, accessible, and secure.

title: 4. Launch Phase
description: It's time to go live! I launch your website, point your domain to it, and register the site with search providers Google and Bing.

title: 5. Support & Maintenance Phase
description: I work with you to iterate on your site, adding any new features as you grow.
